title: THOUGHT / SUPERSTAR COP
description: Composure confirms that you're a Superstar Cop.

dialogueTree.title: Composure: "As you turn, a bright light catches..."
dialogueTree.text: As you turn, a bright light catches your eye, making you squint.

links.title: You: "Cool."
links.text: Cool.

links.title: Composure: "Sooooo cool."
links.text: Sooooo cool.

links.title: You: "Where's it coming from?"
links.text: Where's it coming from?

links.title: Composure: "From a distant sunset? A stage ligh..."
links.text: From a distant sunset? A stage light? Flash photography? Nowhere in particular? It's just what *superstar law-officers* do -- they squint at lights. And they solve shit.

links.title: You: "Actually, now that I hear *supersta..."
links.text: Actually, now that I hear *superstar* and *law official* in a sentence they sound weird together.

links.title: Composure: "What are you, deaf? They're perfect..."
links.text: What are you, deaf? They're perfect! Like 'rockstar politician' and 'drug-addict teacher'. Embrace the superstardom you've worked so hard to establish.

links.title: You: "You've got the wrong impression. I'..."
links.text: You've got the wrong impression. I'm no superstar. I'm trash.

links.title: Composure: "Yeah, a cool *trash* superstar. Big..."
links.text: Yeah, a cool *trash* superstar. Big dick cop down on his luck. Salaam Rocky Bhai. Bad-ass, on the edge disco cop. Time to recede into a ludicrous fantasy world, HERE WE GO! Camera, lights...

links.title: You: "Yeah, that's me -- I've been *estab..."
links.text: Yeah, that's me -- I've been *establishing* my superstardom hard lately.

links.title: Composure: "Yeah, you have! You're a big dick c..."
links.text: Yeah, you have! You're a big dick cop. Dick Mullen. Salaam Rocky Bhai. Bad-ass, on-the-edge disco cop. Time to recede into a ludicrous fantasy world, HERE WE GO! Camera, lights...

links.title: You: "ACTION!"
links.text: ACTION!

links.title: Composure: "With a sudden flash the world freez..."
links.text: With a sudden flash the world freezes around you -- and you along with it. In an iconic monochrome solution, a black silhouette against a rasterized orange world. It's *on*.

links.title: You: "Wait, what's that about a ludicrous..."
links.text: Wait, what's that about a ludicrous fantasy world?

links.title: Composure: "Yeah. You know, beneath it is just..."
links.text: Yeah. You know, beneath it is just heartbreak, a pulmonary tract infection, atherosclerotic disease. This is where you say *action* and re-conceptualize all that. Re-invent it as the world's first celebrity police officer!

links.title: Conceptualization: "This is the beginning of your *lege..."
links.text: This is the beginning of your *legend*.

links.title: You: "Fuck it -- ACTION!"
links.text: Fuck it -- ACTION!

links.title: You: "No. I'm too down beat. I won't say..."
links.text: No. I'm too down beat. I won't say those things anymore. [Wave off the thought.]

links.title: You: "No. Fuck you! [Finish thought]"
links.text: No. Fuck you! [Finish thought]

links.title: You: "[Discard thought.]"
links.text: [Discard thought.]

links.title: Composure: "You sure? The light is *important*...."
links.text: You sure? The light is *important*. The light is life. And destiny.

links.title: You: ""Yes." [*Really* discard it.]"
links.text: "Yes." [*Really* discard it.]
